Assessment.QuestionText: Can you match the properties, methods, and events of the <font face="courier new">MonthCalendar</font> control against their corresponding descriptions?

Options.Option: Event that is raised when a date is selected using the mouse.
Property used to set the background color of the title region.
Property used to identify the date with a circle.
Method used to redraw the dates in bold to view the list of bolded dates.
Method used to display a date in bold on an annual basis.

Assessment.CorrectFeedback: Yes, that's correct! You get one point for your response.
Assessment.incorrectFeedback: No, that's incorrect. The correct combinations are: (A)-(2), (B)-(3), (C)–(5), (D)–(1), and (E)-(4).
